name: Cyclops Labyrinth
description:
⏱️⏱️⏱️CYCLOPS LABYRINTH is a small game created FULLY in 3 hours.⏱️⏱️⏱️

PLEASE IF YOU PLAY IN WEBGL, CLICK INSIDE THE SCREEN WHENEVER YOU RESTART SO THE MOUSE LOCKS IN THE WINDOW

The THEME was "Dont Shoot!" 
So get in the skin of a cyclops who just want to take a breath of fresh air and need to avoid killing their mates.

(For the best experience I recommend download the windows executable, and play in full screen) 😀😀
All the assets in the game has been created inside that time span.

The game is my entry for the 3hours jam TRIJAM #214.
There are also two development videos, one for the full 3 hours, and another speed up version. Check them!

Sorry, forgot to add an EXIT button, and had no time to use raycasts to polish the jump while walking  :__(
